reviews.title: Healing
reviews.comment: This is the best by far. I have spent over three months searching for something like this. Great background music and encouraging verses. I would only suggest the option to have continuous play on the verses instead of having to press play on each verse. Overall it\'s great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work!
reviews.comment: Every time I try to open the app it makes me force close saying the app has stopped working. The app never started working! Bummed because I was really looking forward to the app! Please update and fix so those who need it, yet can\'t open past the \"force close\" could actually benefit from it. Thank you!!
reviews.author: Laurie Mounts

reviews.title: Won\'t open
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t do anything but require a force close every time  I try to open it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: It always makes me force close the app
reviews.author: Terrell H

reviews.comment: I was disappointed that the text was not sized right to fit in the screen. I am unable to read the entire scripture.
